input.sentences: the crew started out early one morning .
the captain did an excellant job of keeping the crew on course .
the ride back to shore included a delicious cup of coffee .
the crew finally found their land legs after dark . it was a long day !
output.sentences: The fisherman set out for the day on their boat.
The water ahead looked very choppy, so they braced themselves.
The captain looked out ahead to see that maybe it wouldn't be so bad.
They all took a short break for tea before fishing the entire day.
Catching many fish, the fisherman considered the day a success.
